name: DIVIDO Retro - Original math puzzle
description:
DIVIDO is an original and addictive math puzzle game. It’s a totally new way of playing puzzle games. There’s no other number crunching game like it. Can you beat the DIVIDO machine by scoring 99999 points?!

Go back in time with the retro version of DIVIDO. It gives you a feeling of an old arcade machine on your smartphone. Real 70’s look and feel. When you shake your phone, you can see the tilt of an old CRT screen!

Use your brain quickly and find the right number to clear the screen from tiles that fall from the top. Clear 10 or more tiles from the screen and get rewards. For special turbo mode, try playing 4-5-6 and pressing the SteamBytes button. Find out other secret codes during the game.

• No Ads or in-app-purchases at all!

• Challenge your friends! Share your scores through Facebook!

• Earn achievements and see how you are doing in the rankings!

• Fair gameplay as there are no hidden tweaks in randomness!


Get DIVIDO Retro now to test your brain and feel how gaming was back in the 70’s!

Check out also DIVIDO Modern for different game experience.
